I think that I like this latest change - personally I'd go for either this or the right-click menu with a tooltip telling you that it exists. I see the issue with users not knowing that the right-click menu exists though, I re-discovered the analysis routines' menus in lyse myself recently, it's not obvious unless you know and remember that it's there!

In Windows 10 the arrow on your new button looks a lot bigger than in your screenshot above. Is it an icon or a unicode character?
